name: Kenneth Mendez
coverLetter:
Hi
Ken M here. Budding master grower in search of immediate hire. MJ WorkerPermit test passed app# granted. Responsible, hard working, disciplined.  
Also, if you or anyone else has possible LUCS approved land to get a micro tier 1 producers license going I would like to make an offer or partner up. Coming from a family of certified tree experts and independent contractor by trade I bring leadership and innovation skills to the table and look forward to hit the ground running.
Thanks 
Ken M
541-690-5854
